hr.p: Prospective Parents: If your child will be entering Kindergarten through 4th grade for the 2019-2020 school year, please register below to receive more information regarding your neighborhood Success Academies.

div.div: Academic Calendars -->Curriculum Guides -->Family Handbooks -->Flynn O'Hara Uniforms -->SA Gear -->The Robertson Center -->School Safety Plan

div.p: Stories and insights on excellent education.

p.span: Success Academyhas suspended on-campus learning and will shift all 18,000 students to remote learning, starting Thursday, March 19, until further notice.

strong.span: Closuresand Cancellations

p.a: DOE buildings are scheduled to reopen to students on Monday, April 20. Will SA schools re-open on April 20 as well?
Are school activities and sport practices and games cancelled?
Is SA considering pushing back the last day of school?
For younger grades, do we need a computer or laptop?

I am a parent who is not familiar with the remote learning system. Does this mean I have to run my home as if my child were in school? Do I log in at particular times? Can I please have more information on how this works?
What if I dont have wifi at home or my internet isnt reliable?
What about Wednesday half days? Will scholars have a different schedule for Wednesday?
Could you please indicate the dress code for our SA scholars for remote learning, particularly for MS and HS who will have live classes? Are they supposed to put on their uniform?
How do I find books for my scholars grade level?
How will students be graded? (ES)
Will scholars just be reviewing material during remote learning, or will they be learning new material as well?
Its not easy to print the schedule for the week. Can you separate out each week and make it print compatible so its much easier for parents?
Will state exams continue as planned?
What if I have to work during the day?(ES)
What if I have to work during the day?(MS)
I am a parent who works from home. Do you have any suggestions on how to juggle my schedule with my scholars remote learning schedule?
What if my scholar relied on school lunch?
Someone at my childs school tested positive. Does that mean my family should get tested?
Can you share your remote instruction with the DOE?
Will teachers and staff be financially covered during this time?
Will the lottery still be held on April 1?
Will scholars still have off for Spring Break?
What about graduations for seniors, 8th graders, 4th graders? Will those events be held?
Will SA be providing mental health services to kids during this time?
Will my scholar continue to receive special services (speech therapy, occupational therapy, etc.)?

strong.span: Closuresand Cancellations

p.b: DOE buildings are scheduled to reopen to students on Monday, April 20. Will SA schools re-open on April 20 as well?
p.br: Success has not stated a date for when our schools will reopen because we dont think that can be determined at this point. We announced that learning would be remote until further notice.

span.b: Are school activities and sport practices and games cancelled?

p.span: All after-school programming and weekend activities are cancelled until further notice.

strong.span: Is SA considering pushing back the last day of school?

p.span: We are not planning to extend the school year.

strong.span: For younger grades, do we need a computer or laptop?

div.p: No, younger grades do not need a device. The daily and weekly plans for grades K-3 will be accessible via your mobile phone. You may choose to print this document and have your scholar complete work directly in the provided space, or they can write their responses to questions in a separate notebook.

strong.span: I am a parent who is not familiar with the remote learning system. Does this mean I have to run my home as if my child were in school? Do I log in at particular times? Can I please have more information on how this works?

p.span: Families will get very specific information via email on how the remote learning plan will work. Schedules vary by grades. For middle school and high school scholars, yes, they will need to log in to video conferences with their teachers at particular times each day. Specific information that we provide will include instructions for you and your scholar to ensure successful remote learning.

strong.span: What if I dont have wifi at home or my internet isnt reliable?

p.span: Charter Communications announced that they will provide free broadband for two months to households with students. To enroll in Charters free broadband program, eligible consumers must call 844-488-8395. The company said it will waive installation fees for new student households. Comcast has also announced that it will offer low-income families who live within Comcast service areas 60 days of free Internet Essentials service. Go to InternetEssentials.com, call 855-846-8376 for English, or call 855-765-6995 for Spanish. Altice USA is also offering Altice Advantage 30 Mbps broadband solution for free for 60 days to any new customer household. Eligible households interested in this solution can call
866-200-9522 to enroll in Optimum region or 888-633-0030 to enroll in Suddenlink region. We will continue to add to this list as we learn of more options.

p.b: Using your mobile device as a hotspot

div.p: Did you know that you may be able to use your cell phones data as a way to connect computers or tablets to the internet? By creating a mobile hotspot a type of wireless internet service you can easily connect multiple devices online.

p.span: The hotspot feature on your phone uses your data plan to tether or connect other devices like your scholars chromebook to the internet. Its important to note that using the hotspot feature will use your devices data, and your data limits do apply. Video streaming over this type of connection will use a large portion of data, so try to avoid playing videos when connected to a hotspot

p.b: How to enable and connect to your hotspot:

p.span: Follow
for using your device as a mobile hotspot.
Follow
for using your device as a mobile hotspot

strong.span: Could you please indicate the dress code for our SA scholars for remote learning, particularly for MS and HS who will have live classes? Are they supposed to put on their uniform?

p.span: Please refer to the Community Guidelines

strong.span: What about Wednesday half days? Will scholars have a different schedule for Wednesday?

p.span: We are suspending our Wednesday half day schedule during remote learning; your childs remote learning daily schedule will therefore be the same, Monday through Friday. As of now, our school calendar will remain the same for Gr K-8. For Gr 9-12, April 6th was originally planned to be a Faculty Development Day. It will now be a full day of remote learning. Our family-facing school calendar will be updated and reshared shortly noting this change.

strong.span: How do I find books for my scholars grade level?

p.span: Its so important that your kids continue to read and that theyre reading books that are of interest. Elementary school scholars took home books in their book baggie that are on grade level. In addition, during your scholars daily check-in with their teacher, please be sure to ask your scholars teacher for recommendations.

strong.span: How will students be graded? (ES)

p.span: We look forward to sharing with you soon our plans for how your scholars performance will be assessed during remote learning. We have been focused first on working with our staff, scholars and families to get into the habit of remote learning.

strong.span: Will scholars just be reviewing material during remote learning, or will they be learning new material as well?

p.span: During the initial phase of our remote learning, our goal for Grades K-4 is to maintain their current level of mastery with a focus on reading. For Grades 5-12, our goal is to continue and further scholar learning and mastery. We look forward to sharing more information about our scholar learning objectives as we continue to build out our remote learning plans.

span.strong: Its not easy to print the schedule for the week. Can you separate out each week and make it print compatible so its much easier for parents?

div.p: You asked! We listened. We will now include a PDF specifically designed for printing each week, in addition to the web-based, translatable version. Look for the link starting 4/17.

strong.span: Will state exams continue as planned?

p.span: All NYS assessments (Grades 3-8) have now been suspended for the rest of the school year, including the state English Language Arts Test, the state Mathematics Test, Grade 4 and Grade 8 state science tests, the New York State English as a Second Language Achievement Test (NYSESLAT) in Grades K-12, and the New York State Alternate Assessment (NYSAA) for students with severe cognitive disabilities in Grades 3-8 and high school.

div.p: In addition, SA has postponed the PISA for Schools Exam until further notice.

strong.span: What if I have to work during the day? (ES)

div.p: We understand that this is a stressful time. Please share your scholars daily schedule with whomever is caring for your child while you are at work and let your scholars teacher know so they know whom to contact to speak and support your scholar. Be sure to let your childs teachers know the best time to reach you, so they can stay in touch!

strong.span: What if I have to work during the day? (MS)

p.span: You will receive a communication that outlines your scholars daily schedule so that you know what is expected of your scholar and can follow-up to make sure expectations are met. Additionally, your scholars advisor and/or teachers will remain in contact with you so that you are aware of how your scholars remote learning is progressing

strong.span: I am a parent who works from home. Do you have any suggestions on how to juggle my schedule with my scholars remote learning schedule?

p.span: We know this is a challenging and difficult situation. Please reach out to your scholars teacher or advisor to discuss how to best support your scholar during remote learning.

strong.span: What if my scholar relied on school lunch?

div.p: We are happy to confirm that SchoolFoods services will continue to offer breakfast and lunch as Grab-and-Go meals. Effective Monday, March 23, SchoolFoods will be transitioning to 400 hub sites across NYC. Families can pick up one days worth of meals (one breakfast and two lunch meals) at any hub site locations main entrance between the hours of 7:30am and 1:30pm.

Additionally, free meals are now available for all New Yorkers, Monday through Friday, 7:30 am to 1:30 pm. Find hub sites here or by texting FOOD or COMIDA to 877-877. You can also check out this article for more resources on getting food delivery, as well as information about NYCs food pantries.

strong.span: General
Someone at my childs school tested positive. Does that mean my family should get tested?

p.span: If you have been exposed to COVID19
you develop a fever and symptoms, such as cough or difficulty breathing, call your healthcare provider for medical advice.

strong.span: Can you share your remote instruction with the DOE?

p.span: We regularly share certain parts of our curriculum and best practices through the Robertson Center and the Success Academy Ed Institute. You can sign up here to learn more: https://www.successacademies.org/robertsoncenter/

strong.span: Will teachers and staff be financially covered during this time?

p.span: All staff are working during this time, and will receive their regular salaries and benefits.

strong.span: Will the lottery still be held on April 1?

p.span: The new scholar lottery is scheduled for Monday, April 6, and it will be held! All applications are due by April 1.
Continue to encourage your friends and family with young children to apply!

strong.span: Will scholars still have off for Spring Break?

div.p: Yes, spring break will be observed from March 30 through April 3. Remote learning will resume on April 6.

strong.span: What about graduations for seniors, 8th graders, 4th graders? Will those events be held?

div.p: We dont know what public policies will be in place in two months or whether the spread of COVID-19 will have been halted. It is too early to tell.

strong.span: Will SA be providing mental health services to kids during this time?

p.span: If your child receives counseling, we are working on a plan to continue services over the phone or via FaceTime. You should also reach out to your school psychologist or notify your scholars teachers if your child is in need of support.

strong.span: Will my scholar continue to receive special services (speech therapy, occupational therapy, etc.)?

p.span: The NYC Department of Education has decided that related services will be provided remotely via teletherapy. In the coming days, you should expect to hear directly from your provider(s) to confirm your consent for services, assess your scholar for teletherapy, and set a schedule for services based upon outcomes of the assessment. We are working directly with these providers to determine the best way to ensure all scholars receive the appropriate related services during this time and to develop a schedule that does not conflict with your scholars daily remote learning schedule.

a.span: Coping with Stress During an Outbreak

p.span: Informacin para padres enviada por el DOE, 3.10.20

a.span: How to Talk to Kids about Coronavirus
Just For Kids: A Comic Exploring The New Coronavirus
NYC Health What You Need to Know Fact Sheet

p.a: NYC Coronavirus FAQ

p.span: Success Academy 13 de marzo de 2020

hr.p: Success Academy anunci a las familias y al personal que ha suspendido el aprendizaje en el campus y cambiar a los 18,000 estudiantes a aprendizaje remoto, a partir del jueves 19 de marzo, hasta aviso adicional.

strong.span: Los edificios del DOE estn programados para reabrir a los estudiantes el lunes 20 de abril. Las escuelas SA volvern a abrir tambin el 20 de abril?

hr.p: El xito no ha establecido una fecha para la reapertura de nuestras escuelas porque no creemos que se pueda determinar en este momento. Anunciamos que el aprendizaje sera remoto hasta nuevo aviso.

span.b: Se cancelan las actividades escolares, las prcticas deportivas y los juegos?

hr.p: Con vigencia inmediata, toda la programacin despus de la escuela y las actividades de fin de semana se cancelan hasta aviso adicional.

strong.span: Para los grados ms jvenes, necesitamos una computadora o computadora porttil?

hr.p: No, los grados ms jvenes no necesitan un dispositivo. Los planes diarios y semanales para los grados K-3 sern accesibles a travs de su telfono mvil. Puede elegir imprimir este documento y hacer que su estudiante complete el trabajo directamente en el espacio provisto, o puede escribir sus respuestas a las preguntas en un cuaderno separado.

strong.span: Soy un padre que no est familiarizado con el sistema de aprendizaje remoto. Esto significa que tengo que manejar mi casa como si mi hijo estuviera en la escuela? Me conecto en momentos particulares? Puedo tener ms informacin sobre cmo funciona esto?

hr.p: Las familias recibirn informacin muy especfica por correo electrnico sobre cmo funcionar el plan de aprendizaje remoto. Los horarios varan segn los grados. Para los estudiantes de secundaria y preparatoria, s, debern iniciar sesin en videoconferencias con sus maestros en momentos particulares cada da. La informacin especfica que proporcionamos incluir instrucciones para usted y su estudiante para garantizar un aprendizaje remoto exitoso.

strong.span: Qu pasa si no tengo wifi en casa?

hr.p:
Charter Communications anunci que proporcionarn banda ancha gratuita durante dos meses a los hogares con estudiantes. Para inscribirse en el programa de banda ancha gratis de Charter, los consumidores elegibles deben llamar al 844-488-8395. La compaa dijo que exonerar las tarifas de instalacin para los nuevos hogares de estudiantes. Comcast tambin ha anunciado que ofrecer a las familias de bajos ingresos que viven dentro de las reas de servicio de Comcast 60 das de servicio gratuito Internet Essentials. Vaya a InternetEssentials.com, llame al 855-846-8376 para ingls, o llame al 855-765-6995 para Espaol. Altice USA tambin ofrece la solucin de banda ancha Altice Advantage de 30 Mbps de forma gratuita durante 60 das a cualquier nuevo hogar de clientes. Los hogares elegibles interesados en esta solucin pueden llamar
866-200-9522 para inscribirse en la regin de Optimum o 888-633-0030 para inscribirse en la regin de Suddenlink. Continuaremos agregando a esta lista a medida que conozcamos ms opciones .

span.strong: Usar su dispositivo mvil como punto de acceso

hr.p: Saba que puede usar los datos de su telfono celular para conectar computadoras o tabletas a Internet? Al crear un punto de acceso mvil, un tipo de servicio de Internet inalmbrico, puede conectar fcilmente mltiples dispositivos en lnea.

La funcin de punto de acceso en su telfono utiliza su plan de datos para conectar o conectar otros dispositivos, como el Chromebook de su estudiante, a Internet. Es importante tener en cuenta que el uso de la funcin de punto de acceso utilizar los datos de su dispositivo, y sus lmites de datos se aplican. La transmisin de video a travs de este tipo de conexin utilizar una gran porcin de datos, por lo tanto, trate de evitar reproducir videos cuando est conectado a un punto de acceso.
Cmo habilitar y conectarse a su punto de acceso:
iOS / iPhone: siga estos pasos para usar su dispositivo como punto de acceso mvil.
Android: siga estos pasos para usar su dispositivo como punto de acceso mvil.

span.strong: Podra indicar el cdigo de vestimenta para nuestros acadmicos de SA para el aprendizaje remoto, particularmente para MS y HS que tendrn clases en vivo? Se supone que deben ponerse su uniforme?

hr.p: Consulte las pautas de la comunidad

strong.span: Tendrn los estudiantes un horario diferente para el mircoles?

hr.p: Estamos suspendiendo nuestro horario de medio da del mircoles durante el aprendizaje remoto; Por lo tanto, el horario diario de aprendizaje remoto de su hijo ser el mismo, de lunes a viernes. A partir de ahora, nuestro calendario escolar seguir siendo el mismo para Gr K-8. Para Gr 9-12, el 6 de abril se plane originalmente para ser un Da de Desarrollo de la Facultad. Ahora ser un da completo de aprendizaje remoto. Nuestro calendario escolar orientado a la familia se actualizar y se volver a compartir en breve teniendo en cuenta este cambio.

span.strong: Cmo encuentro libros para el nivel de grado de mi alumno?

hr.p: Es muy importante que sus hijos continen leyendo y que lean libros que sean de su inters. Los eruditos de la escuela primaria se llevaron a casa libros en sus bolsos de libros que estn a nivel de grado. Adems, durante el registro diario de su estudiante con su maestro, asegrese de pedirle recomendaciones al maestro de su estudiante.

strong.span: Cmo sern calificados los estudiantes? (ES)

hr.p: Esperamos compartir pronto con usted nuestros planes sobre cmo se evaluar el rendimiento de su estudiante durante el aprendizaje remoto. Nos hemos enfocado primero en trabajar con nuestro personal, acadmicos y familias para adquirir el hbito del aprendizaje remoto.

strong.span: Acaso los acadmicos solo revisarn el material durante el aprendizaje remoto, o tambin aprendern material nuevo?

hr.p: Durante la fase inicial de nuestro aprendizaje remoto, nuestro objetivo para los grados K-4 es mantener su nivel actual de dominio con un enfoque en la lectura. Para los grados 5-12, nuestro objetivo es continuar y fomentar el aprendizaje y el dominio acadmico. Esperamos compartir ms informacin sobre nuestros objetivos de aprendizaje acadmico a medida que continuamos desarrollando nuestros planes de aprendizaje remoto.

strong.span: Exmenes
Continuarn los exmenes estatales segn lo planeado?

hr.p: Todas las evaluaciones del estado de Nueva York (Grados 3-8) han sido suspendidas por el resto del ao escolar, incluida la prueba estatal de artes del lenguaje ingls, la prueba estatal de matemticas, las pruebas estatales de ciencias de grado 4 y grado 8, el ingls del estado de Nueva York como Prueba de logro del segundo idioma (NYSESLAT) en los grados K-12, y la Evaluacin alternativa del estado de Nueva York (NYSAA) para estudiantes con discapacidades cognitivas severas en los grados 3-8 y la escuela secundaria.

strong.span: Trabajo
Qu pasa si tengo que trabajar durante el da? (ES)

hr.p:
Entendemos que este es un momento estresante. Comparta el horario diario de su estudiante con la persona que cuida a su hijo mientras est en el trabajo e infrmele al maestro de su estudiante para que sepa a quin contactar para hablar y apoyar a su estudiante. Asegrese de informar a los maestros de su hijo cul es el mejor momento para comunicarse con usted para que puedan mantenerse en contacto!
Qu pasa si tengo que trabajar durante el da? (MS)

Antes del jueves, cuando comience el aprendizaje remoto, recibir una comunicacin que describe el horario diario de su estudiante para que sepa lo que se espera de su estudiante y pueda hacer un seguimiento para asegurarse de que se cumplan las expectativas. Adems, el asesor y / o maestros de su estudiante permanecern en contacto con usted para que sepa cmo est progresando el aprendizaje remoto de su estudiante.

strong.span: Soy un padre que trabaja desde casa. Tiene alguna sugerencia sobre cmo hacer malabarismos con mi horario con el horario de aprendizaje remoto de mi alumno?

hr.p: Sabemos que esta es una situacin desafiante y difcil. Comunquese con el maestro o asesor de su estudiante para analizar la mejor manera de apoyar a su estudiante durante el aprendizaje remoto.

strong.span: Almuerzo escolar
Qu pasa si mi estudiante confi en el almuerzo escolar?

p.br: Nos complace confirmar que los servicios de SchoolFoods continuarn ofreciendo desayuno y almuerzo como comidas para llevar. A partir del lunes 23 de marzo, SchoolFoods har la transicin a 400 sitios centrales en toda Nueva York. Las familias pueden recoger el valor de un da de comidas (un desayuno y dos almuerzos) en la entrada principal de cualquier centro de operaciones entre las 7:30 a.m. y la 1:30 p.m.

hr.p: Adems, las comidas gratuitas ahora estn disponibles para todos los neoyorquinos, de lunes a viernes, de 7:30 a.m. a 1:30 p.m. Encuentre sitios centrales aqu o enviando un mensaje de texto con los mensajes COMIDA o COMIDA al 877-877. Tambin puede consultar este artculo para obtener ms recursos sobre la entrega de alimentos, as como informacin sobre las despensas de alimentos de Nueva York.

strong.span: Alguien en la escuela de mi hijo dio positivo. Eso significa que mi familia debe hacerse la prueba?

p.br: Si ha estado expuesto a COVID-19 y presenta fiebre y sntomas, como tos o dificultad para respirar, llame a su proveedor de atencin mdica para que lo asesoren.

strong.span: Puedes compartir tus instrucciones remotas con el DOE?

hr.p:
Regularmente compartimos ciertas partes de nuestro plan de estudios y mejores prcticas a travs del Centro Robertson y el Instituto de Educacin Success Academy. Puede registrarse aqu para obtener ms informacin: https://www.successacademies.org/robertsoncenter/
Los maestros y el personal estarn cubiertos financieramente durante este tiempo?
Todo el personal est trabajando durante este tiempo y recibir sus salarios y beneficios regulares.

strong.span: La lotera se llevar a cabo el 1 de abril?

hr.p: La nueva lotera escolar est programada para el lunes 6 de abril y se llevar a cabo! Todas las solicitudes deben presentarse antes del 1 de abril. Contine animando a sus amigos y familiares con nios pequeos a que presenten su solicitud!

strong.span: Los acadmicos todava tendrn apagado para las vacaciones de primavera?

hr.p: S, las vacaciones de primavera se observarn del 30 de marzo al 3 de abril. El aprendizaje remoto se reanudar el 6 de abril.

strong.span: Qu pasa con las graduaciones para estudiantes de ltimo ao, octavo grado, cuarto grado? Se llevarn a cabo esos eventos?

hr.p: No sabemos qu polticas pblicas se implementarn en dos meses o si la propagacin de COVID-19 se habr detenido. Es muy temprano para saberlo.

strong.span: SA proporcionar servicios de salud mental a los nios durante este tiempo?

hr.p: Si su hijo recibe asesoramiento, estamos trabajando en un plan para continuar los servicios por telfono o por FaceTime. Tambin debe comunicarse con el psiclogo de su escuela o notificar a los maestros de su estudiante si su hijo necesita apoyo.

strong.span: Mi estudiante continuar recibiendo servicios especiales (terapia del habla, terapia ocupacional, etc.)?

hr.p: El Departamento de Educacin de Nueva York ha decidido que los servicios relacionados se proporcionarn de forma remota a travs de teleterapia. En los prximos das, debe esperar escuchar directamente de su (s) proveedor (es) para confirmar su consentimiento para los servicios, evaluar a su estudiante para la teleterapia y establecer un cronograma para los servicios en funcin de los resultados de la evaluacin. Estamos trabajando directamente con estos proveedores para determinar la mejor manera de garantizar que todos los estudiantes reciban los servicios relacionados apropiados durante este tiempo y para desarrollar un horario que no entre en conflicto con el horario de aprendizaje remoto diario de su estudiante.

div.class: xl__col4 l__col5 m__col5 s__col12 col--last single-post-sidebar

div.p: Success Academy operates 45 high-performing public charter schools serving 17,000 students across New York City.

p.b: Kind is the New Cool SA Harlem Easts 1,000 Acts of Kindness Challenge

div.p: When my Senior Leader Ms. McNamara challenged us to come up with a school community-building campaign, I saw it as an opportunity to highlight one of SA Harlem Easts greatest strengths: our kindness.

p.b: SA HSLA Freshmen Share the Inside Scoop on Choosing Success and Navigating Ninth Grade

div.p: Whats life like as a high schooler at Success? Kayla Christiani-Ellis and Tasnim Moumouni are two current freshmen who recently had to choose between specialized high schools and SA HSLA. We asked them to share what ultimately drew them to Success, and whether the experience has so far lived up to their expectations.
